question.explain-text: In the lecture, the professor says that we'll look at the three kinds of American colonies before the American revolution: royal colonies, proprietary colonies, and corporate colonies, that the first type of American colony was a royal colony, that the second type of American colony was a proprietary colony, that the last type of American colony was a corporate colony, and that these were the three types of colonies: royal, proprietary, and corporate. From this, it can be determined that the information in the lecture is organized by classifying various types of colonies. The second answer is therefore the best answer to this question.
